title: Update: D.C.-Area Counties Have Their Own Say As MD, VA Lift Indoor Mask Mandate
description: Neither state will require individuals to wear masks indoors starting Saturday.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
